headline: 3 Stocks to Buy Ahead of Midterm Elections This Year
summary: As we kick off a New Year, investors looking to rebalance their portfolios or put new capital to work in retirement accounts have plenty to consider. Which sectors, markets, and economies investors choose to put their capital to work in matter a great deal. Of course, for those who expect to retain a significant amount ... 3 Stocks to Buy Ahead of Midterm Elections This Year

headline: BP Expects Q4 Upstream Production to Be In Line Sequentially
summary: BP updates fourth-quarter 2025 and full-year guidance, lifts 2025 tax rate view, flags weaker price realizations, big impairments and a sharp drop in net debt.

headline: Energy ETFs in Spotlight as US Natural Gas Prices Set to Fall This Year
summary: Energy ETFs like XLE come into focus as EIA forecasts a 2026 US natural gas price dip, followed by a sharp rebound expected in 2027.

headline: Halliburton and Its Rivals Can’t Wait to Get Back Into Venezuela
summary: When it comes to stepping up Venezuelan oil production, investors bet that the early returns will go to oil-field services companies.

headline: When Oil Falls but Exxon and Chevron Don’t
summary: Aggressive layoffs, efficiency gains, and exits from loss-making low-carbon ventures helped the five supermajors generate about $96 billion in free cash flow.
